about_the_game:
Leader of the Pack is a wildlife simulator with RPG elements. You are playing as a wolf trying to survive and thrive in her environment. Find your prey and chase it till it drops for food. Find friends and enemies among other wolves. When scarcity hits, find your food in most unlikely places. Get other wolves to join you. Become the leader of the pack.
In the Leader of the pack, you are in a wild environment with some small human villages. It is a large and open world with weather, seasonal and day-night events. Rabbits, deers, moose and fishes are your primary source of food. Chicken and sheep are easy prey but, it isn't easy to deal with vengeful humans.
Humans and bears are best avoided as every wound you take can be permanent. Even though you have a chance to win, it is not worth being crippled.
Getting involved with other wolves can be tricky. They can be friends or competitors. Beware the other wolf packs as they are always hostile to any other wolf.
As you hunt, you will have a chance to improve your skills and become a better hunter. Then, find a companion in opposite sex and have little puppies which will be the next generation of wolves.
No two animals are same in the Leader of the Pack. Find and prey upon weak animals or challenge yourself to hunt the strongest opponents.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 or Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-12700 or Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 Super or or Radeon RX 5700XT or Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required

short_description: Nature, in her untamed stage, is savage and unrelenting. Survive the nature as long as you can as a wolf. Hunt, form a pack, protect your territory and do whatever necessary to survive. Also, beware as there is a new threat; human element. Will you thrive or wither away in your environment?
